job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop, and optimize AI pipelines for scalable deployment.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and refinement of technical systems (AI pipelines) with a focus on their deployment and scalability, which are core software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Research best practices for monitoring, versioning, and automating AI workflows.
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring, versioning, and automation of workflows are key components of MLOps, focusing on the operational aspects of managing AI in production.

job_tasks.phrase: Implement solutions that enhance the efficiency and reliability of AI models in production.
job_tasks.justification: Enhancing efficiency and reliability of AI models in production aligns with the operational maintenance and improvement goals of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: We are currently developing an LLM-based application called Oddit that is able to create AI roadmaps and strategies based on inputs such as interviews, data quality scans and code reviews.
job_tasks.justification: Developing an LLM-based application involves building user-facing software systems and integrating AI capabilities, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: optimize AI model performance in Energy
job_tasks.justification: Optimizing AI model performance is a core task related to the development and refinement of machine learning models.

job_tasks.phrase: improving real-time data pipelines in a geospatial setting
job_tasks.justification: Improving data pipelines, especially those dealing with real-time data, is a data engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: enhancing the AI system scalability for a large platform
job_tasks.justification: Enhancing scalability for a system is a software development concern, ensuring the system can handle increased load.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate with a small team to bring innovative AI solutions to life.
You'll work on innovative AI solutions
Your AI Engineering Pitch: Bring your own AI engineering topic
Are you looking for a place to graduate where you can gain hands-on experience

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing LLM-based applications, designing AI pipelines for deployment, and mentions specific GenAI technologies like LLMs and frameworks. While MLOps tasks are present, the core focus is on building user-facing AI solutions.
